rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2

name: Artazon
rules: Once during each player’s turn, that player may search their deck for a Basic Pokémon that doesn’t have a Rule Box and put it onto their Bench. Then, that player shuffles their deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play.

name: Atticus
rules: You can use this card only if your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Poisoned.
Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Clive
rules: Your opponent reveals their hand, and you draw 2 cards for each Supporter card you find there.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Electric Generator
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and attach up to 2 Basic Lightning Energy cards you find there to your Benched Lightning Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Iono
rules: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, each player draws a card for each of their remaining Prize cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Moonlit Hill
rules: Once during each player’s turn, that player may discard a Basic Psychic Energy card from their hand in order to heal 30 damage from each of their Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play.

name: Nemona
rules: Draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Nemona’s Backpack
rules: Put up to 2 Nemona cards from your discard pile into your hand.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Nest Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Paldean Student
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon that doesn’t have a Rule Box, reveal it, and put it into your hand. For each Paldean Student card (not including this card) in your discard pile, you may search for an additional Pokémon in this way. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Paldean Student
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon that doesn’t have a Rule Box, reveal it, and put it into your hand. For each Paldean Student card (not including this card) in your discard pile, you may search for an additional Pokémon in this way. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor’s Research (Professor Sada)
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Professor’s Research (Professor Turo)
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rare Candy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it, skipping the Stage 1. You can’t use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Technical Machine: Crisis Punch

attacks.name: Crisis Punch
attacks.text: You can use this attack only when your opponent has exactly 1 Prize card remaining.

rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.) (If this card is attached to 1 of your Pokémon, discard it at the end of your turn.)
You may attach any number of Pokémon Tools to your Pokémon during your turn.

name: Ultra Ball
rules: You can use this card only if you discard 2 other cards from your hand.
Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
